name: Welcome to Orochi Park Demo
detailed_description:
DEmo Bugs

You can now play the demo! There are two noteworthy bugs. first, because the full game is not out, you may get a "can't install" error, when trying to play the demo. Just keep on pressing "yes" and the demo will override and install. This is a Steam bug, as Steam is not really made for demos being out a year in advance of the game.

Second, you can't yet play the demo on laptops. I'll have this feature ready by Christmas, but right now the resolution scaling is not implemented for monitors smaller than 1920px.


About the Game

An interactive fiction adventure-strategy parody. Send agents on missions, build your base, research occult superweapons and buy units. Along the way, unlock occult mysteries. Plus romance Kelly from Mass Effect. You play the demo now for free.

Important demo notes: There are a couple of bugs due to the full game still being a year off. First, you may get an error trying to install the demo as Steam is saying "No can't install full version yet". Just keep pressing "yes" and the demo will install. Second, the game does not yet scale to laptop monitors, only 1920px and 2560px. I will fix this by Christmas.

Key Features


  • A parody of Mass Effect and The Secret World
  • Deep adventure-strategy gameplay
  • Detailed interactive fiction

A Parody of Mass Effect and The Secret World


Command a troupe of movie cosplayers with a collective IQ of 100. Romance Kelly from Mass Effect and BioWare's Favorite Redhead (definitely not the same person). Solve conspiracy-laden mysteries. Resist the urge to buy Conan Exiles.

Deep Adventure-Strategy Gameplay


Every turn, send agents to gather weapons and forge alliances. Set strategic priorities in the doomsday bunker in five locations - the War Room, the Armoury, the Barracks, the Library and the Black Market.

Detailed Interactive Fiction


Welcome to Orochi Park features detailed art and a compelling story that's fully voice acted. Hundreds of strategic choices lead to 20 color-coded endings. All slightly different.

short_description: An interactive fiction adventure-strategy parody. Send agents on missions, build your base, research superweapons and buy units. Along the way, unlock occult mysteries. Plus romance Kelly from Mass Effect. You can play the demo for free. The full game releases late 2018.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 700 MB available space

legal_notice: Uses only original assets and all parody references in accordance with US copyright law.
